Header: Rally held in Hambantota to support UNP Deputy Leader Sajith Premadasa
Content: A public rally of Hambantota District Candidate, UNP Deputy Leader Sajith Premadasa was held in Hambantota on Saturday August 1. A group including Hema Premadasa were also in attendance at this rally. During the meeting UPFA Urban Councillor M.L.M. Yehiya also joined the United National Party.
